member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.DataAdapters.LCXLocResourceDataAdapter.LoadObjects(Microsoft.Localization.LocDocument,Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Core.Misc.ConfigDictionary)
member.summary: The constructor must specify what datasources are expected to be provided to the object factory For example, at this moment all LocResource properties are created from LCX (LocDocument) but some properties (buildNumber, project, etc.) cannot be retrieved from LCX so we need additional datasource(s) (in this case a simple struct with a bunch of strings)
member.returns: Objects loaded from the LocDocument and 'flattened', with all properties extracted.
